issue.title: locale's copy assignment operator should return locale&

discussion.p: Curiously, locale's copy assignment operator currently returns const locale&. As Casey Carter noted in microsoft/STL#268, this is:

li.p: The only occurrence in the entire Standard Library.

discussion.p: We aren't aware of any reason for this to be const. (I observe that this hasn't changed since N1804 on 2005-04-27 and probably goes back to C++98; I suspect that when this was originally specified, copy assignment operators were relatively new, and conventions for them weren't rigorously followed.)

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4842.

blockquote.pre: const locale& operator=(const locale& other) noexcept;

blockquote.p:
-14- Effects: Creates a copy of other, replacing the current value.
-15- Returns: *this.
